articles.title: Warren Buffett is betting on a glow-up for Ulta Beauty
articles.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway added Ulta Beauty and Heico to its stock portfolio last quarter as it slashed its huge stake in Apple.
articles.content:
Warren Buffett's company placed new bets on Ulta Beauty and Heico, exited Snowflake and Paramount Global, and halved its Apple stake last quarter.

articles.title: Die Hoffnung stirbt zuletzt: iMac mit 27 oder 30 Zoll bleibt auf Apples Agenda
